name: psr1mulr
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cmulr, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cmulr, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cmulr, c1), cfv(cmulr, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cmulr, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cmulr, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cmulr, c1), cfv(cmulr, c2))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cmulr, c1), cfv(cmulr, c2))
-| wi(wtru, wceq(cfv(cmulr, c1), cfv(cmulr, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cmulr, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cmulr, c2))
-| wi(wtru, wceq(cfv(cmulr, c1), cfv(cmulr, c2)))

stmt.origin: opsrmulr(c1, c2, c1o, c3, emptycls, wtru)
stmt.pretty: opsrmulr(c1, c2, c1o, c3, emptycls, wtru)

body.origin:
|- wi(wtru, wceq(cfv(cmulr, c1), cfv(cmulr, c2)))
-| wceq(c1, co(c1o, cmps, c3))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(co(c1o, copws, c3), emptycls))
-| wi(wtru, wss(emptycls, cxp(c1o, c1o)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cmulr, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cmulr, c2))

-| wceq(c2, cfv(co(c1o, copws, c3), emptycls))
-| wi(wtru, wss(emptycls, cxp(c1o, c1o)))

body.origin:
|- wceq(c2, cfv(co(c1o, copws, c3), emptycls))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cps1, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cmulr, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cmulr, c2))
-| wceq(c1, co(c1o, cmps, c3))

cumulated.origin:

comment: Value of multiplication in a univariate power series ring. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Mar-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)
